name: Sam Bogart vol. 2
description:
More html5 games at http://m.blackmoondev.com

We meet the troubled bear detective in the second part of his noir investigation.

The cunning Vixen manipulated Sam into messing with the powerful cat's mob. He needs to negotiate stuff with those Cats now - and this involves a lot of punching, kicking and hitting.

Sam needs a lot of answers to his questions.

Will he be able to save the Vixen from the cats? What does the Vixen want? What do the Cats want? Is it wise to go bare handed into the gunfights? And most importantly - would there be any honey at the end of this case?

So put on your fedora on and help Sam beat up some Cats and resuce the damsel from distress!
